name: Hetmanate
description:
The Hetmanate is the text based strategy game about a political scene in 17 century in the center of Europe, on the territory of the Zaporozhian Army or Hetmanate - the country that brought together most of the Ukrainian ethnic lands at that time. You will be able to witness and directly participate in the beginning of the Ruin - one of the most tragic and, at the same time, heroic periods in the history of Ukraine.

Influence political and diplomatic decisions, build the economy of the state and take part in wars to help it survive. And although it is impossible to radically change the course of history - all the key events will take place at that time, from now the state of the country depends on you.

Enjoy the game with History, Politics, Wars and Diplomacy.

Features:

  • The real historical events of Europe of the 17th century.
  • Political figures and stories based on historical facts.
  • Compare your decisions to those that were actually made.
  • More then 10 different game endings.
  • Three levels of difficulty - Jura, Cossack, Ottaman.
  • Estimated time of gameplay: 5 hours in real time.

You can play game here - HistoryGame.net or download "hetmanate.html" below and open it in any browser.
